item.title: DigiRail appointed to Digital Outcomes and Specialists 5 (DOS5)
item.description: We are delighted to have been appointed as a supplier on Crown Commercial Service’s Digital Outcomes & Digital Specialists framework. This new listing enables us to offer outstanding digital outcomes and specialists to the UK rail sector.

item.title: User Adoption – The Achilles Heel of Digital Transformation?
item.description: I often deride myself when critiquing the career choices and career passions that have characterised my working life. I can’t help but think I could’ve taken one or two easier paths…….
